content: Moved drone code to enemies.js [Manual edit]
Let's make our drones turn to face towards the player whenever they are active

Certainly! I've updated the `spacezone-enemy-drone` element to enable drones to turn and face the player whenever they become active. The rotation is smoothly adjusted each frame to ensure realistic behavior. Please review the changes and let me know if you have any specific preferences for rotation speed or additional behaviors.

Add an event handler on our drones for the "hit" event. When fired, we'll call our .explodeDrone() function.

Remove the call to this.drone.die() in this function, and instead set this.pos.z = -9999.

I have implemented the requested changes by adding an event handler for the `"hit"` event on each drone, which triggers the `.explodeDrone()` function. Additionally, I have removed the call to `this.drone.die()` within the `explodeDrone` function and replaced it with setting `this.pos.z = -9999`. Please review the updates below and let me know if you have any further modifications or questions.
